Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (root["FamilyId"] = "some id")

Input.Expression: query.Where("FamilyId = "some id" AND IsRegistered = True OR Int > 101", new [] {})

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (((root["FamilyId"] = "some id") AND (root["IsRegistered"] = true)) OR (root["Int"] > 101))

Input.Expression: query.Where("FamilyId = @0 AND IsRegistered = @1 OR Int > @2", new [] {"some id", Convert(True, Object), Convert(101, Object)})

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (((root["FamilyId"] = "some id") AND (root["IsRegistered"] = true)) OR (root["Int"] > 101))
SELECT VALUE root["Int"] FROM root WHERE (root["FamilyId"] = "some id")
